text: Stephen Bassett (born March 27, 1995) is an American cyclist, who currently rides for UCI ProTeam . ==Major results== ;2013 : 2nd Road race, Junior National Road Championships : 5th Overall Tour de l'Abitibi ;2015 : 5th Overall Joe Martin Stage Race ;2019 : 1st 20px Overall Joe Martin Stage Race ::1st 20px Mountains classification ::1st Stages 1 & 3 (ITT) : 1st Stage 3 Redlands Bicycle Classic : 2nd Road race, National Road Championships : 9th Overall Tour de Hokkaido ::1st Stage 2 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:American male cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Knoxville, Tennessee
title: Stephen Bassett
